name: Victorian Debutant
description:
Victorian Debutant is a visual novel kind of simulation in which you, the player, become a teenage debutant getting ready for adulthood. Will you become a jewel in English society's crown? Or will you be rebel who walks her own paths in life?

The mechanics are as simple as the game itself - there are 9 scenes in which you have to make a choice (you have four options). Be aware that every choice has an impact on what ending you will get. There are also four of them endings.

I hope you have fun! If you do and would like to play more of my games or just play online, check my Newgrounds profile:
https://liquiddarkness.newgrounds.com/

If you're over 18 or any other legal age of your country of residence or just want to support me (highly recommended (please, support me, anyone ಥ_ಥ)) there's my Patreon page, where you can find out I need you to be 18 ☜(⌒▽⌒)☞

https://www.patreon.com/m/liquiddarkness

Alrighty then, have fun!
